title: Online Science Learning Design Workshop Based on Communities of Inquiry

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Science Theories and Experience with Online Learning Tools
context.additional_context: Learners engage in inquiry community activities in offline settings using digital devices, with learning outcomes measured through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can design online discussion activities on science topics using the E-tivities model
Learners can structure online learning activities reflecting the three presences of the CoI model (social, cognitive, teaching presence)
Learners can plan and execute collaborative problem-solving projects in science using digital tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
